channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art
channel.item:
https://www.rics-notebook.com/blog/Personal/prostate Dont Collapse My Pronouns: A Quantum Call for Respect https://www.rics-notebook.com/blog/Personal/prostate
A playful meditation on assumptions—first about pronouns, then a twist: let’s stop collapsing quantum states too. No more presuming whats inside, whether its identity or qubits. Fri, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo) quantum computingidentitypronounssuperpositioninclusion undefined
